parameters.name: AutoPay
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable automatic payment. Valid values:

*   **true**: enables the feature. You must make sure that your account balance is sufficient.
*   **false**: disables the feature. An unpaid order is generated.

>  Default value: true. If your account balance is insufficient, you can set AutoPay to false to generate an unpaid order. Then, you can log on to the ApsaraDB RDS console to complete the payment.

parameters.name: AutoRenew
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable auto-renewal for the instance. Valid values:

*   **true**
*   **false** (default)

parameters.name: AutoUseCoupon
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to use a coupon. Default value: false. Valid values:

*   **true**: uses a coupon.
*   **false**: does not use a coupon.

parameters.name: BusinessInfo
parameters.description: The additional information about the order.

parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description: The client token that is used to ensure the idempotence of the request. You can use the client to generate the value, but you must make sure that the token is unique among different requests. The token can contain only ASCII characters and cannot exceed 64 characters in length.

parameters.name: CommodityCode
parameters.description:
The commodity code of the instance.

Default value: **rds_customprepaid_public_intl**.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the RDS Custom instance.

parameters.name: PayType
parameters.description: The billing method of the instance. Set the value to **PrePaid**, which indicates the subscription billing method.

parameters.name: PeriodAlign
parameters.description:
Specifies whether the instance is a subscription instance. Valid values:

*   **true**
*   **false** (default)

parameters.name: TimeType
parameters.description:
The unit of the renewal period specified by the **UsedTime** parameter. Valid values:

*   **1**: year
*   **2** (default): month

parameters.name: UsedTime
parameters.description:
The subscription duration of the instance. Valid values:

*   If you set the **TimeType** parameter to **1**, the value of the UsedTime parameter ranges from **1 to 5**. Unit: year.
*   If you set the **TimeType** parameter to **2**, the value of the UsedTime parameter ranges from **1 to 11**. Unit: month.
